chapter.title: Gnome-Shell
chapter.para: This chapter is about Gnome-Shell, next generation of Gnome.

sect1.title: How to install Gnome-Shell
sect1.para: The first thing you need to do, is to install Gnome-Shell.
Open Desktop Effects from: System > Preferences > Desktop Effects
Choose Gnome Shell, and it will change current desktop to Gnome-Shell.

sect1.title: Configure Gnome-Shell
sect1.para: There isnt much to configure in Gnome-Shell. But there is few things.
There you can find few settings you can enable/disable.
